summary: Replaced the regular input field in market-research-platform.tsx with the AutoCompleteSearch component to match the functionality in the main market-intelligence-tool.tsx. Added the necessary import for AutoCompleteSearch component and updated the props to work with the autocomplete functionality.
current_status: The market-research-platform.tsx now uses the AutoCompleteSearch component instead of a regular input field, providing consistent autocomplete functionality across both components. The component is properly imported and configured with the correct props.
